scripts.build:ssr: ng build --configuration production && ng run GplusUI:server:production
scripts.build:dev: ng build --configuration=devplus --output-path=dist/Dev/plus/browser && ng run GplusUI:server:devplus --output-path=dist/Dev/plus/server && ng build --configuration=devseller --output-path=dist/Dev/seller/browser && ng run GplusUI:server:devseller --output-path=dist/Dev/seller/server
scripts.build:dev2: ng build --configuration=dev2plus --output-path=dist/Dev2/plus/browser && ng run GplusUI:server:dev2plus --output-path=dist/Dev2/plus/server && ng build --configuration=dev2seller --output-path=dist/Dev2/seller/browser && ng run GplusUI:server:dev2seller --output-path=dist/Dev2/seller/server
scripts.build:dev3: ng build --configuration=dev3plus --output-path=dist/Dev3/plus/browser && ng run GplusUI:server:dev3plus --output-path=dist/Dev3/plus/server && ng build --configuration=dev3seller --output-path=dist/Dev3/seller/browser && ng run GplusUI:server:dev3seller --output-path=dist/Dev3/seller/server
scripts.build:master: ng build --configuration=masterplus --output-path=dist/Master/plus/browser && ng run GplusUI:server:masterplus --output-path=dist/Master/plus/server && ng build --configuration=masterseller --output-path=dist/Master/seller/browser && ng run GplusUI:server:masterseller --output-path=dist/Master/seller/server
scripts.build:live: ng build --configuration=liveplus --output-path=dist/Live/plus/browser && ng run GplusUI:server:liveplus --output-path=dist/Live/plus/server && ng build --configuration=liveseller --output-path=dist/Live/seller/browser && ng run GplusUI:server:liveseller --output-path=dist/Live/seller/server
